nickname.prompt: What do you want to be called?

gulagQuestions.prompt: Have you ever owned a business or otherwise supported a free market economy? (yes/no)
Are you willing to do anything the government or your waifu/husbando asks of you, even risking life and limb? (yes/no)

Repeat after me:
>>> I pledge my heart and soul to the gulag and my fellow comrade. Long live the supreme anime leader!
gulagQuestions.answer: I pledge my heart and soul to the gulag and my fellow comrade. Long live the supreme anime leader!

republicQuestions.prompt: Have you ever joined a union or otherwise opposed a free market economy? (yes/no)
Are you willing to do anything the government pays you to do, even risking life and limb? (yes/no)

Repeat after me:
>>> I pledge my heart and soul to this great nation and to the pursuit of money. May the president prosper!
republicQuestions.answer: I pledge my heart and soul to this great nation and to the pursuit of money. May the president prosper!
